experience.role: Cisco CX Labs (CXLT) - Frontend Web Developer
experience.date:
Senior Associate Engineer
Ascendion Inc. | Cisco Systems, Inc.
[ Jan 2023 – Present ]
experience.description:
● Implemented complex UI modules with advanced error validation using Formik, dynamically displaying content based on user input to enhance form handling and overall user experience.
● Collaborated with backend teams to integrate modern GraphQL APIs, leveraging queries for efficient data retrieval and mutations for dynamic updates in frontend design.
● Developed reusable, pure React components to minimize regression risks and promote code maintainability.
● Identified the root causes of errors in hotfix and ad hoc tasks, debugged issues, and implemented fixes within strict timelines to ensure smooth application functionality.
● Partnered with product owners, stakeholders, and team members to enforce best practices, mentor junior developers, conduct rigorous code reviews, and coordinate with cross-functional teams.

experience.date:
Ascendion Inc. (Previously Collabera) | FIS Global
[ Jan 2022 – Dec 2022 ]
experience.description:
● Worked on UI development and transitioning a banking app from Internet Explorer to modern browsers (e.g., Chrome, Firefox, Edge).
● Implemented critical banking validations and custom data mapping, optimizing asynchronous data fetching to ensure dynamic and accurate UI displays that met business requirements.
● Enhanced user interactions by utilizing AJAX calls and callback functions, and developed robust form validation logic to improve data integrity and user experience.
● Successfully managed critical modules, consistently delivering high-priority work within established timelines.

● Gained hands-on experience as a trainee with a strong foundation in React, Angular, HTML/CSS while mastering Git workflows on GitHub.
● Expanded skillset by working with Java, Java Collections, and MySQL.
